title: The race to re-train 'obsolete' workers
text:
The race to re-train 'obsolete' workers 6:12am EDT - 06:11
Money manager Oliver Libby discusses the challenges facing today's workforce, income inequality and finding companies that produce what he calls 'social value.' ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
